<denchmark-h:h2>OpenCV Manager on Samsung Galaxy Alpha</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>Find that OpenCV Manager is not correctly installed on Samsung Galaxy Alpha
Device information Hardware: not detected OS version: REL (4.4.4), API 19 </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: Hi there! I would like to help to fix this bug. I have a Samsung Galaxy Alpha. If you need me to make some test or you need some information, please tell me. Many thanks
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/guillegarcia>@guillegarcia</denchmark-link> , please check the latest version of OpenCV Manager from Google Play.

Hello <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mshabunin>@mshabunin</denchmark-link> , I've just downloaded the lastest version of "OpenCV Manager" from play store and it works in my galaxy alpha!! I'm cheking it with the app "OpenCV 15 puzzle" and it works properly now. Many thanks!!
